name: LavaMusic
description: lavalink music bot base in erela.js and discord.js v13

prefix.description: prefix you wanna use in your server

mongourl.description: Your MongoDB URL for custom prefix

SpotifyID.description: Spotify ClientID. This is used if you want to use Spotify features for your bot. (https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/)

SpotifySecret.description: Spotify ClientSecret. This is used if you want to use Spotify features for your bot. (https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/)
